item.title: Hugo
item.description: How to use Hugo-book theme # How to insert images and resize images? # The file tree is like ‚îú‚îÄcontent ‚îÇ ‚îÇ _index.md ‚îÇ ‚îÇ ‚îÇ ‚îî‚îÄdocs ‚îÇ ‚îú‚îÄblogs ‚îÇ ‚îÇ ‚îÇ hugo.md ‚îÇ ‚îÇ ‚îÇ _index.md ‚îÇ ‚îÇ ‚îÇ ‚îÇ ‚îÇ ‚îî‚îÄimages ‚îÇ ‚îÇ Nice.png In hugo.md file, we add Nice.png and scale it by {{< figure src="../images/Nice.png" width="400" alt=" " >}} How to add emoji? # Directly copy emoji icon üëã and paste to .

item.title: HugoBook+GithubAction
item.description: In Windows10, build personal website via Hugo-book and Github Actions # This is blog is about how to use Hugo to create the local website, and then deploy it on GitHub via Github Action. Everything is step by step. Prerequisites # Git Windows 10 VScode Github account Install Hugo # In Windows10, right click Windows Powershell and click run as administrator. Refer to How to install chocolatey in Windows to install chocolatey.

item.title: The Wrong Guy
item.description: After his boss is murdered, Nelson is on the run for fear of prosecution. He hides out in a small town to avoid the police, which should be easy because they know he didn’t do it and they aren’t looking for him. IMDb
